testsuite.name: A_new_user_account_can_be_created_if_a_proper_unused_username_and_password_are_given

testcase.name: creation is successful with valid username and password
creation fails with already taken username and valid password
testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52) at ohtu.Stepdefs.systemWillRespondWith(Stepdefs.java:79) at ✽.system will respond with "new user not registered"(file:src/test/resources/ohtu/new_user.feature:11)

testcase.name: creation fails with too short username and valid password
creation fails with valid username and too short password
creation fails with valid username and password long enough but consisting of only letters
testcase.failure: java.lang.AssertionError at org.junit.Assert.fail(Assert.java:86) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:41) at org.junit.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:52) at ohtu.Stepdefs.systemWillRespondWith(Stepdefs.java:79) at ✽.system will respond with "new user not registered"(file:src/test/resources/ohtu/new_user.feature:26)

testcase.name: can login with successfully generated account
